channel.title: [508] Prayer experience
channel.description:
Wanna make it where when I click a dragon bone it gives the player experience in the prayer skill. I am running a 508, mithscape base. I believe its in the itemoption1.java file, and the dragon bones itemid = 536.
How do I make it where I click it and get prayer experience in other words.
